known_issues: Margin upload button not visible to user (Version 10 / production deployment).

existing_features.title: On the Margin & Collateral page, ensure users who can view the page but lack the "manage_margin" capability can still see the margin upload section area, with a clear in-place message explaining they do not have permission to upload and must contact an admin to enable uploads.

Remove DOM id collisions in BulkUploadSection so that multiple instances on the same page (Margin Snapshots and Pledged Securities) do not share the same file input id, ensuring the "Choose File" control reliably opens the correct file picker.

projectName: Fix Margin upload button visibility on Margin & Collateral page
